modName: Intro Music Replacement- Sons of Skyrim-Metal Cover
summary: An awesome music replacer for skyrim, which incluedes the song from Sons of Skyrim- Metal Cover
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i1164.photobucket.com/albums/q572/macero121/sonsofskyrimstock_zpsaa6ef401.png[/IMG]
The original song is the Sons of Skyrim theme song.This song was popularized on youtube, which is the skyrim theme song with a metal cover played by  [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/sbeast64]sbeaset64 (Original Creator of the song[/url]

The process to include this masterpiece was simple, in that I downloaded the MP3 of the song and converted it into WAV, and finally into XWM.

[b]INSTALLATION:[/b]
You can use either the Nexus Mod Manager (give it time), or manually download the file and extract the contents to your Data\\ folder.

You may need to turn your volume up a little bit to hear it good. I am however working to amplify the song in the future.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gyCFuP3rM2w

[youtube]D-pIDUPLj7c[/youtube]

Changelog
--------------
1.1- A slightly amplified version of 1.0 due to the fact that skyrim wont play the music at full volume. If I amplify anymore, the quality will degrade.
-----------------------------------------------
1.0-  The main file for the song

DON\'T FORGET TO ENDORSE!
author: sbeast64 - Metal covers-youtube
